name: Word Mage
description:
Word Mage is a fast-paced monster fighting RPG, where you destroy enemies by playing a word game. Fight for more than just a high score as you conquer a world, gain powers, and spell your heart out!

== FEATURES ==
- Fight enemies by playing a fast-paced word game
- Overcome game changing status effects
- Cast powerful spells to defeat your enemies
- Collect items to craft new abilities and spells
- Battle mighty bosses

== INCLUDES ==
- A world with 29 stages
- Over 55 enemy types, who cast more than 20 different status effects
- 18 attainable powers, including 4 activated spells
- 11 achievements that show off your dominance

And more to come for free in future updates!
